AIN.caption: Default Provider
AIN.doc: Provide a RPC url for the NFT smart contract you are minting from is on. Mainnet example: https://main-light.eth.linkpool.io
AIN.name: default_provider

AIO.caption: Name
AIO.doc: The name of the NFT being minted.
AIO.name: name

AIP.caption: Description
AIP.doc: The description of the NFT being minted.
AIP.name: description

AIQ.caption: Image
AIQ.doc: The image of the NFT being minted.
AIQ.name: image

AIR.caption: NFT Receiver
AIR.doc: The address of the wallet who can mint this NFT. If you want any address to be able to mint this NFT use: 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000
AIR.name: nft_receiver

AIS.caption: Price
AIS.doc: The price the minter must pay in order to mint the NFT.
AIS.name: price

AIT.caption: Royalty Recipient
AIT.doc: The wallet that will receive the royalties generated from this NFT.
AIT.name: royalty_recipient

AIU.caption: Royalty Percentage
AIU.doc: The percentage of each secondary sale of this NFT that will be sent to the Royalty Recipient.
AIU.name: royalty_percentage

AIV.caption: Primary Sale Recipient
AIV.doc: The wallet that will receive the funds generated from the initial sale of this NFT.
AIV.name: primary_sale_recipient

AIW.caption: Currency Address
AIW.doc: The currency that the minter will be charged to mint the NFT. For the network native token use:  0xeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee
AIW.name: currency_address

AIX.caption: ERC-721 NFT Contract Address
AIX.doc: The ERC-721 NFT smart contract that this NFT will be minted from. Make sure your signing private key has minting permission on the NFT smart contract.
AIX.name: nft_contract_address

AIa.caption: Days Valid
AIa.doc: How many days will this signature be valid for.
AIa.name: days_valid
